compliant.section: NUVOTON TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION and its affiliated companies (hereinafter referred to as “NUVOTON”, “we/our/us”) are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data, Responsibility of the controller

compliant.section: Your Privacy is important to us.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data, Responsibility of the controller

compliant.section: We endeavor to comply with all applicable laws on privacy protection and personal information security.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data, Responsibility of the controller

non_compliant.section: This entire privacy policy does not specify its territorial scope and it is unclear where and to whom it applies.
non_compliant.amend: Clearly state the territorial scope of the policy, specifying to which individuals and data processing activities it applies in compliance with GDPR.

non_compliant.section: This privacy policy lacks specific details about the types of personal data collected, the purposes of processing, the legal basis for processing, and the data retention periods.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data, Lawfulness of processing, Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: Provide specific information about the categories of personal data collected, the purposes and legal basis for processing each category, and the data retention periods.

non_compliant.section: This privacy policy does not mention the rights of data subjects under GDPR, such as the right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right of access by the data subject, Right to rectification, Right to erasure (‘right to be forgotten’), Right to restriction of processing, Right to data portability, Right to object
non_compliant.amend: Include a comprehensive section detailing the rights of data subjects under GDPR and how individuals can exercise these rights.

non_compliant.section: This privacy policy does not mention the use of cookies or other tracking technologies and how individuals can manage their cookie preferences.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data,  Lawfulness of processing
non_compliant.amend: Provide a clear and detailed section on the use of cookies and similar technologies, including the types of cookies used, the purposes of such use, and how users can manage their cookie preferences.

non_compliant.section: This privacy policy does not provide information about the transfer of personal data to third parties or international organizations, including the safeguards in place to protect personal data when transferred outside the EEA.
non_compliant.legal provisions: General principles for transfers, Transfers on the basis of an adequacy decision, Transfers subject to appropriate safeguards
non_compliant.amend: Include a section explaining the circumstances under which personal data may be transferred to third parties or outside the EEA, and the safeguards implemented to ensure adequate protection of personal data during such transfers.

non_compliant.section: This privacy policy does not mention the contact details of the data controller or the data protection officer (DPO), if applicable.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Designation of the data protection officer, Position of the data protection officer
non_compliant.amend: Clearly state the contact details of the data controller and the DPO (if designated), including their names and contact information.

non_compliant.section: This privacy policy does not specify the process for handling data subject requests or complaints.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: Describe the process for individuals to submit data subject requests, including the contact information and estimated response time.

non_compliant.section: This privacy policy does not mention the measures taken to ensure the security of personal data, such as technical and organizational security measures.
non_compliant.amend: Provide information about the technical and organizational measures implemented to ensure the security of personal data, such as access controls, encryption, and employee training.
